Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    The class GameController is the controller of the game. It is a listener of the view, and has a method play which computes the next step of the game, and updates model and view.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController(int width,
                      int height,
                      int numberOfMines)
        Constructor used for initializing the controller. It creates the game's view and the game's model instances
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the board on which the game will be played
        height - the height of the board on which the game will be played
        numberOfMines - the number of mines hidden in the board
